name: Movieplayer.it
tag_list: cinema, movies, movie-reviews, film, serial-tv, home-video
overview:
Movieplayer.it is an online italian magazine focused in cinema, TV series, home videos and television programs. Movieplayer.it is a Multiplayer.it supplement, trademark of NetAddiction Srl. At a statistical level Movieplayer.it emerges as one of the main landmarks among italian web portal focused on movies and tv series.

HISTORY Movieplayer.it website is born in June 2008 after the merger of Castlerock.it website with the movie channel of Multiplayer.it, an online magazine specialized in video games, occurred in the autumn 2007. Movieplayer.it main feature is its ability to offer a wide coverage in “cinema”, “TV”, “TV series”, “home video”, “characters”, “movie events” and Box Office areas, thanks to a huge database of movie contents which results from the mentioned above merger, together with the expertise of a real specialized editorial staff.

Since September 2009 Movieplayer.it is official partner of IMDb.it “New Desk”, with the pledging to provide, in real-time, some extracts of all its publications - news, interviews, reviews and in-depth articles, which are visible both on the IMDb.it homepage, and in all movies, tv-series, news and characters sheets.

Movieplayer.it was “Internet Official Media Partner” of the fifth edition of Rome International Film Festival (Rome, October 28 - November 5, 2010). Movieplayer.it was “Internet Media Partner” of the twenty-eighth edition of the Turin Film Festival (Turin, November 26 - December 4, 2010).

CONTENTS Movieplayer.it is a web portal providing internet users with a huge database on cinema with movies, TV series, characters, DVD and Blu-Ray sheets, as well as continuos updates on everything related to current events and news of cinema and television world. In May 2012 Movieplayer.it collects more than “30,000 movie sheets”, “2,000 TV series sheets”, “80,000 articles”, “20,000 news”, “10,000 videos” and information on more than “300,000 characters” in cinema and television world.
